comment.author: 7279101@N06
comment._content: Mispunctuation on your title.  Should read E. F. O'Dwyer

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Edward F. O'Dwyer (1860-1922), New York judge, Chief Justice of the City Court.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for catching this, and providing some background information on the judge.  We'll make the correction to the title the next time we update the record.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In December, 1913, Judge Edward F. O'Dwyer was elected president of the National Democratic Club. Story in the New York Times, December 14, 1913: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F03E3D61139E6... (He appears to have been unrelated to the later Mayor of New York and U. S. Ambassador to Mexico, William O'Dwyer.)

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry at Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_F._O'Dwyer
